Class HabitRepetitionDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.mad.p03.np2020.routine.DAL.DBHelper
        • com.mad.p03.np2020.routine.Habit.DAL.HabitRepetitionDBHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HabitDBObservable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class HabitRepetitionDBHelper
extends DBHelper
implements HabitDBObservable
    Model used to manage the habitRepetition in SQLiteDatabase
    Since:
    20-07-2020
